title: Smart Data Models - EquivalentEquipment
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents equivalent objects that are the result of a network reduction. The class is the base for equivalent objects of different types.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be EquivalentEquipment

EquivalentNetwork.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The associated reduced equivalents. Default: None
